servo360.spinOneWayWithSpeed: Spins the motor in one direction, with a speed from 0 to 100
servo360.spinOneWayWithSpeed|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
servo360.spinOneWay|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
servo360.spinOtherWay: Spins the motor in other direction at full speed
servo360.spinOtherWayWithSpeed: Spins the motor in the other direction, with a speed from 0 to 100
servo360.spinOtherWayWithSpeed|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
servo360.spinOtherWay|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
servo360.turnOffMotor: Turns off the motor at this pin
servo360.turnOffMotor|param|pin: Which pin the motor is on
